main event: An unidentified flying object was observed in Newcomerstown, Ohio on July 27, 1967.
interesting points: The object was observed for 10 seconds at night and appeared to have lights on the top, bottom, and both sides, resembling a cross structure., The observer noted that only the body of the object moved, while the lights appeared fixed., The object was reported to have a course heading of 045Â° - NW., The observation involved a civilian source and a total of 2 witnesses., The report concluded that there was no data presented to indicate that the object could not have been an aircraft.
